ARTICLE.TITLE: Joan Waterbury named Tibbits volunteer of the month
ARTICLE.TEXT:
Kendallville, IN (46755)

Today

A mix of clouds and sun. A stray shower or thunderstorm is possible. High 87F. Winds light and variable..

Tonight

Variable clouds with scattered thunderstorms. Low 64F. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 60%.

METADATA.keywords: joan waterbury, tibbits opera house, work, theatre, volunteer, june, debit, card., coldwater
METADATA.news_keywords: joan waterbury, tibbits opera house, work, theatre, volunteer, june, debit, card., coldwater
METADATA.description: COLDWATER, Michigan — Tibbits named Joan Waterbury its June Volunteer of the Month honoring her dedication to the historic opera house.
METADATA.author: KPC News Service
